Negotiating consultants recommend that physicians be wary of negotiating over payments for speciÃ¯Â¬Âc codes rather than negotiating over average payments. For one very simple reason: Focusing on the fees for speciÃ¯Â¬Âc procedure codes plays right into the shell game the insurance companies love to playÃ¢â¬Â (Reckenen 2013).

Physicians who opt to negotiate over code-speciÃ¯Â¬Âc payments are encouraged to ensure that the codes over which they negotiate account for the bulk of their practiceÃ¢â¬â¢s revenues: Ã¢â¬Â¢ Ã¢â¬ÅBe sure the codes on your list account for at least 75 percent of total practice charges....
